AssociateCustomerGateway.name: AssociateCustomerGateway
AssociateCustomerGateway.description: Grants permission to associate a customer gateway to a device

AssociateLink.name: AssociateLink
AssociateLink.description: Grants permission to associate a link to a device

CreateDevice.name: CreateDevice
CreateDevice.description: Grants permission to create a new device

CreateGlobalNetwork.name: CreateGlobalNetwork
CreateGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to create a new global network

CreateLink.name: CreateLink
CreateLink.description: Grants permission to create a new link

CreateSite.name: CreateSite
CreateSite.description: Grants permission to create a new site

DeleteDevice.name: DeleteDevice
DeleteDevice.description: Grants permission to delete a device

DeleteGlobalNetwork.name: DeleteGlobalNetwork
DeleteGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to delete a global network

DeleteLink.name: DeleteLink
DeleteLink.description: Grants permission to delete a link

DeleteSite.name: DeleteSite
DeleteSite.description: Grants permission to delete a site

DeregisterTransitGateway.name: DeregisterTransitGateway
DeregisterTransitGateway.description: Grants permission to deregister a transit gateway from a global network

DescribeGlobalNetworks.name: DescribeGlobalNetworks
DescribeGlobalNetworks.description: Grants permission to describe global networks

DisassociateCustomerGateway.name: DisassociateCustomerGateway
DisassociateCustomerGateway.description: Grants permission to disassociate a customer gateway from a device

DisassociateLink.name: DisassociateLink
DisassociateLink.description: Grants permission to disassociate a link from a device

GetCustomerGatewayAssociations.name: GetCustomerGatewayAssociations
GetCustomerGatewayAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe customer gateway associations

GetLinkAssociations.name: GetLinkAssociations
GetLinkAssociations.description: Grants permission to describe link associations

GetSites.name: GetSites
GetSites.description: Grants permission to describe global networks

GetTransitGatewayRegistrations.name: GetTransitGatewayRegistrations
GetTransitGatewayRegistrations.description: Grants permission to describe transit gateway registrations

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tag for a Network Manager resource

RegisterTransitGateway.name: RegisterTransitGateway
RegisterTransitGateway.description: Grants permission to register a transit gateway to a global network

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a Network Manager resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a Network Manager resource

UpdateDevice.name: UpdateDevice
UpdateDevice.description: Grants permission to update a device

UpdateGlobalNetwork.name: UpdateGlobalNetwork
UpdateGlobalNetwork.description: Grants permission to update a global network

UpdateLink.name: UpdateLink
UpdateLink.description: Grants permission to update a link

UpdateSite.name: UpdateSite
UpdateSite.description: Grants permission to update a site
